mains.description: Brined in apple cider and maple syrup, roasted with Hudson Valley herbs
Pan-seared breast with Finger Lakes wine reduction

sides.description: Creamy mashed heirloom potatoes with local cream and roasted garlic
Pan-roasted with Catskills maple syrup and Hudson Valley bacon
Made with foraged New York mushrooms and artisanal sourdough

desserts.description: Classic style with Finger Lakes concord grape compote
Made with Hudson Valley apples and Crown Maple syrup
